meanings.definition: To cross or meet at a point
meanings.sent1: The two roads are intersecting at the traffic light.
meanings.sent2: The hiking trails intersecting in the forest make it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog's paths intersecting led to a playful chase.
meanings.sent4: Their interests and hobbies intersecting created a strong bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The intersecting beams of light created a beautiful pattern on the wall.

meanings.definition: To have a point or line in common
meanings.sent1: The two circles intersecting at one point showed their relationship.
meanings.sent2: The paths of the marathon runners intersecting near the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The intersecting schedules of the siblings caused confusion in the household.
meanings.sent4: Their goals and aspirations intersecting made them great collaborators.
meanings.sent5: The intersecting paths of the planets fascinated astronomers.
